name: Nobody & The Computer
description:
Hey there and a ridiculously warm welcome to my little corner of the internet

Here, AI isn‚Äôt just a tool; it's my sidekick in crime for creativity ‚Äì like peanut butter to my jelly, the Scooby to my Shaggy! 

We're all about mixing techy smarts with a sprinkle of human wackiness to cook up something spectacular. 

So, buckle up and prepare for a wild ride into the funtastic world of AI, where imagination wears the crown and the rules of reality get a little bendy.

Join the Nobdies Collective and you'll get access to tons of tools for AI music, sound, exclusive videos and so much , much, much, much... less üòÇ

videos.description:

üëâ Be part of it here:

00:00 Chimpanzees go wild
02:15 Koalas call the cops
03:20 Police dogs
05:06 Poco Loco Pizzeria
05:51 Yogui the cat
06:11 Dogs and pigs
07:49 Koalas, dogs, and piglets
08:22 Dogs watching pink elephants
09:01 The End






Philosophically, animalism is the idea that humans are fundamentally animals, a theory in personal identity that contrasts with mind-body dualism and John Locke‚Äôs psychological criterion. Thinkers like Eric T. Olson, Peter van Inwagen, Paul Snowdon, and David Hershenov have explored this perspective.
On a social level, animalism also refers to a movement that considers non-human animals to be morally and ethically significant, challenging the way we view our relationship with nature.

videos.title: Where Is My Sock? (Award-Winning A.I. Mockumentary)
videos.description:
This short film was made possible thanks to the incredible support of my Patreon community (The Nobodies Collective). 
Special thanks to each of you for empowering me to bring this project to life.

Join the Nobodies Collective on Patreon and become a financial producer for our upcoming films! Get your name in the credits and see it on the big screen at festivals around the world. Plus, gain access to exclusive tools and tutorials to create amazing things with AI.
‚Ü™ Join the Nobodies Collective: https://www.patreon.com/NobodyandTheComputer

‚Ü™ contact me: 
nobodyandthecomputer@gmail.com
https://www.instagram.com/nobodyandthecomputer/
https://twitter.com/NobodyComputer

The entirety of the visual and auditory content you are about to experience in this film was created using GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE technologies. 
The conceptualization, narrative structure, and post-production assembly of all ai-generated elements are the product of HUMAN creative direction. 

Where Is My Sock? is a hilarious true crime mockumentary that delves into the bizarre phenomenon of disappearing socks. Framed like a serious investigative documentary, the film explores the global epidemic of lost socks, presenting theories from 'experts,' recounting the experiences of 'victims,' and exposing a conspiracy that may reach deeper than anyone imagined. Through deadpan interviews, dramatic reenactments, and pseudo-scientific explanations, Where Is My Sock? pokes fun at the true crime genre, turning an everyday inconvenience into a mystery of epic proportions. Is there a sinister force behind these disappearances, or is it just the wash cycle?

videos.title: GENWAVE: How AI is Redefining Music Genres
videos.description:
‚Ü™ Join the Nobodies Collective:
https://www.patreon.com/NobodyandTheComputer

‚Ü™ contact me: 
nobodyandthecomputer@gmail.com

Prompt & code ‚§µ‚§µ
https://www.patreon.com/posts/genwave-convert-114199943

In addition to creating short films using AI, I also make videos where I experiment with AI tools, capturing the screen while interacting in real-time. 
The idea is simple: whatever happens, happens! 
I call these "Techcumentaries" because they document, in an audiovisual way, the process of working with a tech tool. Sometimes they evolve into something meaningful, sometimes they don't‚Äîbut the goal is to share the creative journey.
In this case, I dive into the wonders of symbolic music, having ChatGPT compose music in text form, which I then convert to MIDI‚Äîthe beloved protocol from the '80s that I hold dear.

After borrowing a mysterious television from a friend, her reality begins to unravel.

videos.title: Yes, A.I. will save Music
videos.description:
We might aptly describe this film as a "technockumental," blending the essence of a mockumentary‚Äîa fictional documentary‚Äîwith a deep dive into music's transformative journey. This film orbits around the provocative hypothesis that AI can rescue music, presenting technical methodologies to explore this claim. It's a journey through the pivotal changes in music history, a voyage to the past conducted with tools from the future, all the while showcasing the beautiful possibilities afforded by present-day technologies.

videos.title: Robort (A.I. Short Film)
videos.description:
To create this short film, I utilized AI extensively, but there's a significant amount of human effort and creativity behind it. It's not just about generating prompts and producing a film‚Äîfar from it.

The idea for the film was entirely human. I don't believe AI can come up with great story ideas on its own, so I didn't use AI for the initial idea phase. I wrote the basic outline of the script without any AI assistance. Once the story was clear, I started developing the characters. Through trial and error with text-to-image generators, I created Robert, the main character, the robots with their retrofuturistic look, and the rest of the characters.

As I polished the script, I used AI as a creative collaborator for specific tasks. For example, I used AI to rewrite dialogues to match specific eras, styles, or tones‚Äîespecially the lines for the robots.

Instead of traditional methods involving cameras, real actors, musicians, and sound designers, etc, I used AI to generate the images, convert those images to video, create the voices, generate the music and the sound effects. Everything you see and hear was generated using generative AI.

Think of this as a new genre of filmmaking. It's not meant to replace traditional films but to exist alongside them, much like animated films. AI will not replace humans; it's a tool that, in this case, made it possible for a story imagined by a human to become a short film. Without AI, this film might never have existed. The story I envisioned is now available for you to see, thanks to AI.
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

Set in a future where robots have taken over significant roles in society, the film centers on Robert, a once-aspiring singer who has settled into a life as an accountant. As robots become increasingly integrated into everyday life, Robert finds himself out of a job, without a girlfriend, and separated from his band. In a bold move to reclaim his passion for music, he disguises himself as ROBORT, a robot singer, and quickly rises to fame. However, when his true identity as a human is revealed, it sparks a resurgence of interest in human musicians, making Robert an unexpected hero. The film tells a story of resilience, identity, and the human spirit amidst the rise of technology.

videos.title: Punk Sinatra (An A.I. mockumentary)
videos.description:
The forgotten punk pioneer
To make this mockumentary, I used AI. But I want to be clear - if I could, I would not use AI. I would grab a camera, find some friends, seek producers to fund it, hire designers, musicians, and take the time to make it how I would really want.

I've had this idea for about 15 years, but given the complexity, I never went through with it :-( The AI gave me the chance to finally realize it, to materialize the idea and get it out of my head.

I admit, I would have preferred to do it another way, but for some reason it happened like this. As the saying goes "Done is better than perfect."

Friends, let's use AI as a tool, not a replacement for creativity. These technologies make realizing our visions easier. But human imagination remains irreplaceable. AI is an ally, not an adversary, for bold minds. We are still the dreamers - technology only reflects our spark.
_____________________________________________________________________

videos.title: The Mannequin (A.I. Film)
videos.description:
This film is something special ‚Äì it's been put together entirely with AI. Sure, it might not be perfect, and it‚Äôs definitely different from the movies that are typically made by people. But you can‚Äôt deny it's getting better every day. We wanted to show you this project to give you a peek at how quickly technology is advancing. At heart, this film is all about the interesting interplay between human creativity and the exactness of machines. We‚Äôre not saying AI should replace humans in filmmaking, but rather, it can be another tool for artists to use in expressing themselves.

For those of you looking to make films, here's a bit of advice: Get out there with a cellphone, and start filming. Don‚Äôt just sit at home brainstorming or getting stuck on prompts. While it's okay to use AI to draft and test an idea to see if it works, remember: it‚Äôs just a tool. AI can be a great helper, but it shouldn‚Äôt replace the unique, irreplaceable human touch that makes art. 
Your intuition, insight, and emotions as a creator are crucial, bringing depth and nuances to your work that technology alone can't achieve. 
So use AI as a supplementary resource, not as the driving force behind your creativity.

videos.title: A.I. MEMEs with chatGPT, Dall-E 2 & Jukebox
videos.description:
Are you ready to witness the birth of some of the most absurd, wacky, and hilarious memes the internet has ever seen? Here we unleash the creative power of cutting-edge AI technology to bring you a non-stop barrage of meme madness.
With ChatGPT at the helm, expect plenty of puns, jokes, and clever wordplay that'll leave you in stitches. And when words alone can't convey the full absurdity of a meme, we've got DALL-E 2 to create custom images that are so weird, they might just blow your mind. And just when you thought it couldn't get any better, Jukebox cranks up the volume with its library of killer tunes that'll have you tapping your feet and humming along.
So sit back, relax, and prepare to have your senses bombarded with an endless stream of meme magic. This video is guaranteed to be the perfect cure for boredom and a guaranteed mood booster. So, what are you waiting for? Hit the play button and join us on this wild meme ride!

Jump on the hype train for this channel, and help me crank out even more wicked videos like this one:
